DOC.HEADLINE: NHL ROUNDUP ; QUINN ' S GOALS KEEP SHARKS AT_BAY , 2-1
DOC.TEXT: Dan Quinn scored his first two goals of the season , one in each of the first two periods , to give the Ottawa Senators a 2-1 victory at San Jose on Thursday night . The Sharks failed to add_to their four-point lead over the Mighty Ducks in the race for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference . Pittsburgh 4 , Boston 2 -- Jaromir Jagr and Martin Straka scored on breakaways at Boston as the Penguins won their eighth in a row over the Bruins . New York Islanders 3 , Detroit 1 -- Derek King had two goals and an assist to lead the Islanders at Detroit and ruin the Red Wing debut of goalie Bob Essensa . Quebec 4 , Hartford 1 -- Garth Butcher and Mike Ricci scored short-handed goals at Quebec to help the Nordiques stretch their unbeaten string to seven games ( 5-0-2 ) and move within five points of the Florida Panthers for the final playoff position in the East . New Jersey 6 , Buffalo 1 -- Stephane Richer and Bill Guerin scored 28 seconds apart in the second_period for the_Devils at Buffalo .
